item.description:
This last Brunch was so enjoyable that I think that we should do it again!

So once again, let's rendezvous at The Gaslight where we can enjoy the delicious food (at a very reasonable price), in a scrumptious (Authentic French) atmosphere, and enjoy the tantilizing conversations of others.

Afterwards, we can meander over to the SOWA markets where 44 vendors of fresh fruits & veggies, aromatic (and not) flowers, quality crafts and artwork, unique jewelry and novelties will tempt all of your senses.

Note: each guest is responsible for their own bill; Paypal is NOT accepted at this event.

FREE parking adjacent to the restaurant
item.name: Deja vu
